snippet: GENUNG--Diana Riggs, died peacefully on January 11, 2016, following a short and courageous battle with cancer. She was born in Elmira, NY in 1946, the daughter of Elizabeth Falck Riggs Hart and John S. Riggs. She graduated from Miss Hall's School in Pittsfield, MA and Beaver College in Glenside, PA. She is survived by her husband of 48 years, Frederick M. Genung of Naples, FL and Old Forge, NY; her son Alexander M. Genung and his wife Elizabeth (Lee) Carstensen Genung of Stowe, VT; her daughter Elizabeth (Kate) G. Taylor and her husband Prescott B. Taylor of Wellesley, MA; four grandchildren, Lucy and Chip Genung, and Ellie and Caroline Taylor; her sister Anne A. Good of Naples, FL and Old Forge, NY. A memorial service will be held at 10:30am on January 30th at the Naples Botanical Garden. In lieu of flowers, please consider a gift to the Naples Neighborhood Health Clinic or The Everglades Foundation, both in Naples, FL, or the Mission Boutique thrift store and food pantry in Old Forge, NY (Niccolls Memorial Presbyterian Church, PO Box 605, Old Forge, NY 13420). 1/3
